main event: Crew of merchant vessel sighted a bright red object breaking up in the sky on 15 November 1962.
interesting points: The sighting lasted less than 1 minute,The object was seen falling at a rate of 20Â° per second,The report suggests the sighting could possibly be a satellite decay,The sighting was noted in Project Blue Book, which investigated UFOs from 1952 to 1969,The object was described as trailing as it broke apart.
sighted object: a bright red object breaking up
witness description: Crew of merchant vessel M/V ACONIS
